# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.MOVBE property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

MOVBE instruction. A value of true indicates that the processor supports MOVBE instruction.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: MOVBE
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey MOVBE { get; }
```
